messages.subject: Samurai Archives status
messages.msgSnippet: Since the server change over we haven t been able to add any updates.  The setup is expected to be completed today, but we won t know for sure for a day or two
messages.messageBody:
Since the server change over we haven't been able to add any
updates. The setup is expected to be completed today, but we won't
know for sure for a day or two - - after that, we should be able to
get some updates put up. Thanks for your patience, all.

c.west

http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/
